summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5912 for the improvement of Commodore Way, from 23rd Avenue West to 40th Avenue West; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 78015, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
